nodes.name: getOpenMarkets

params._marketStartTime: The time at which market will create.
params._optionRangePerc: Option range percent of neutral min, max options (raised by 2 decimals)

burnDisputedProposalTokens(uint256).details: Burns the tokens of member who raised the dispute, if dispute is rejected.

params._reward: The reward which is claimed by user.
params._user: The address who claim their reward.

params._totalReward: The amount of reward to be distribute.
params.closeValue: The closing value of the market currency.
params.winningOption: The winning option of the market.

claimCreationReward().details: function to reward user for initiating market creation calls

claimPendingReturn(uint256).details: Claim the pending return of the market.

params.maxRecords: Maximum number of records to claim reward for

createGovernanceProposal(string,string,s.details: Create proposal if user wants to raise the dispute.

params._stakeForDispute: The token staked to raise the diospute.
params._user: The address who raises the dispute.
params.proposalTitle: The title of proposal created by user.

params.functionSignature: Signature of the actual function to be called via meta transaction
params.userAddress: Address of user trying to do meta transaction

getMarketDetails(address).details: Gets the market details of the specified address.

params._marketAdd: The market address to query the details of market.

getMarketDetails(address).return: _feedsource bytes32 representing the currency or stock name of the market.minvalue uint[] memory representing the minimum range of all the options of the market.maxvalue uint[] memory representing the maximum range of all the options of the market.optionprice uint[] memory representing the option price of each option ranges of the market._ethStaked uint[] memory representing the ether staked on each option ranges of the market._plotStaked uint[] memory representing the plot staked on each option ranges of the market._predictionType uint representing the type of market._expireTime uint representing the expire time of the market._predictionStatus uint representing the status of the market.

getMarketDetailsUser(address,uint256,uin.details: Gets the market details of the specified user address.

params.fromIndex: The index to query the details from.
params.toIndex: The index to query the details to
params.user: The address to query the details of market.

getMarketDetailsUser(address,uint256,uin.return: _market address[] memory representing the address of the market._winnigOption uint256[] memory representing the winning option range of the market.

getOpenMarkets().details: Gets the addresses of open markets.
getOpenMarkets().return: _openMarkets address[] memory representing the open market addresses._marketTypes uint256[] memory representing the open market types.

getTotalAssetStakedByUser(address).details: Get total assets staked by user in PlotX platform
getTotalAssetStakedByUser(address).return: _plotStaked Total PLOT staked by user_ethStaked Total ETH staked by user

params._defaultAddress: Address authorized to start initial markets

isAuthorizedToGovern(address).details: checks if an address is authorized to govern

isMarket(address).details: Checks if given addres is valid market address.

pauseMarketCreation().details: Updates Flag to pause creation of market.

resolveDispute(address,uint256).details: Resolve the dispute if wrong value passed at the time of market result declaration.

params._result: The final result of the market.

resumeMarketCreation().details: Updates Flag to resume creation of market.

setMasterAddress().details: Changes the master address and update it's instance

setUserGlobalPredictionData(address,uint.details: Emits the PlacePrediction event and sets the user data.

params._leverage: The leverage selected by user at the time of place prediction.
params._prediction: The option range on which user placed prediction.
params._predictionAsset: The prediction assets user will get.
params._value: The amount of ether user staked.

transferAssets(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer `_amount` number of market registry assets contract to `_to` address

updateMarketImplementations(uint256[],ad.details: Update the implementations of the market.

upgradeContractImplementation(address,ad.details: Upgrade the implementations of the contract.

executeMetaTransaction(address,bytes,byt.notice: Main function to be called when user wants to execute meta transaction. The actual function to be called should be passed as param with name functionSignature Here the basic signature recovery is being used. Signature is expected to be generated using personal_sign method.
